home.title: Serverless RAG Console
home.description: This application is a console for ingesting documents into the deployed RAG and chatting with it.

quickstart.title: Quick Start
quickstart.step1: First, you need to put your documents (PDF) into the S3 bucket.
quickstart.step1link: Go to the Document Embedding page
quickstart.step2: Once you place the documents in the S3 bucket, the embedding process will start automatically, so please wait.
quickstart.step2failure: The embedding process is not complete yet

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: This dashboard displays information about the RAG system deployed by this solution.
dashboard.embeddingprocessqueue: Number of documents waiting for embedding process

embedding.title: Document Embedding
embedding.description: On this page, the embedding process will start automatically when you upload your documents (PDF) to the S3 bucket. You can check the already uploaded documents and the size of the embedded index files.
embedding.draganddrop: Drag and drop files here, or click to select files.
embedding.name: Name

ragchat.title: RAG Chat
ragchat.description: On this page, you can chat with the chatbot using RAG.
